title: Option to lock your choice in the store?
body: A while ago, there was an update in the store. Before the update it was possible to (de)select the option "Show Owned" in champions tab and the game would remember it being on-or-off, so the next time it would be the same. Everytime I go to the store now, I have to click the "Show Owned" to be able to hide the champions I own. It's not a big deal of course, but I believe the older, permanent choice was a lot easier and more convenient. Is there some possiblity to 'lock' the option I might have overlooked? Or would this perhaps be integrated in any future update?

replies.body:
What you're experiencing is normal behavior with the new shop, as I was able to reproduce it with my own account. I don't know if the shop will remember the selection in the future, but I encourage you to post the idea to [Miscellaneous](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) if you are really passionate about it.

Let me know if you have any questions.
